problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
x="L/(H+1)"
problem.p:
A dog sits on the left end of a boat of length L that is initially adjacent to a dock. The dog then runs toward the dock, but stops at the end of the boat. If the boat is H times heavier than the dog, how close does the dog get to the dock?
Ignore any drag force from the water.
\(x =\)
